attributes.action: an everlasting effigy of Diana Princess of Wales. Westminster Abbey.
attributes.additional_details: Diana Princess of Wales carried out work to show the world of issues we didn't want to address. Aids, landmines, loving, homelessnes, povity.  She took on causes we wanted to ignore. Her work during the short time she was able to give has changed our perspective and has changed our view on the world today. If Diana Princess of Wales had not done what she did when she did it we would not be so conscientious today and willing to assist where we can.
attributes.background: The late Diana Princess of Wales is still remembered. We want a likeness in Westminster Abbey to honour and remember her.

rejection.details: The decision to grant a memorial in Westminster Abbey rests solely with the Dean of Westminster.
